law.catch_line: Construction of chapter -- Administrator's power to make regulations.
law.text: This chapter shall be given a liberal construction in the interpretation thereof. The administrator shall have power to make rules and regulations for implementing this chapter; and when promulgated according to KRS Chapter 13A, the same shall have the force and effect of law.
law.history: Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 15, sec. 26, effective February 20, 1960.

metadata.lrc-note: (10/5/90). Pursuant to KRS 7.136(1), KRS Chapter 13A has been substituted for the prior reference to KRS Chapter 13 in this statute. The sections in KRS Chapter 13 were repealed by 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 417, รยง 36 and KRS Chapter 13A was created in that same chapter of the 1984 Ky. Acts.
